import React, { Component } from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { activeAdd: false, newUser: false, editUser: false, onInput: false, readOnly: true, formValues: [ { id: 0, nameChange: "Mr.A", ageChange: "37", nicknameChange: "A" }, { id: 1, nameChange: "Mr.B", ageChange: "22", nicknameChange: "B" }, { id: 2, nameChange: "Miss C", ageChange: "32", nicknameChange: "C" } ] }; this.handleInputChange = this.handleInputChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); } handleClick(e) { this.setState({ activeAdd: true, }); } handleInputChange(event) { let formValues = this.state.formValues; let name = event.target.name; let value = event.target.value; formValues[name] = value; this.setState({formValues}) } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ newUser: true, activeAdd: false, }); } deleteUser(id){ const newState = this.state; const index = newState.formValues.findIndex(a => a.id === id); if (index === -1) return; newState.formValues.splice(index, 1); this.setState(newState); } addRow(e){ return(
) } addUser(event) { return ( Edit Delete ); } editUser(e){ return(
) } render() { return (
